title: If you could identify with one fictional character (from a movie, a show or a book), who would it be, and why? - Quora

response.answer_text: I will go for Batman. Why? -You see Batman is the one who does not have any special power and does not even need any. That is, he is not bit by a spider (Spiderman), neither is he a mutant (X-Men) and nor he is from other planet (Superman) . He is just a Homo Sapien as you and me. On the other hand not even a gifted one, as everyone dear to him was taken away at very early stages of his life. His parents were shot dead in front of his eyes . Batman keeps learning from his mistakes.

Movie : I will go with Ironman / Tony Stark. because he is engineer, loves to learn, loves dressing up and narcissistic but also cares about everyone secretly, also doe not care about money (one difference he does not care because he has lot of ’em, I does not care because I have none of ‘em). Show : I will go with
